001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.main;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Threads;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearRegression;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.PolynomialFunction;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer.*;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.Plot;
013
014import java.util.*;
015
016public class ModelIterativeLearning {
017
018    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
019    public static <O extends LinearModelOptimizer<N> & IterativeOptimizer<N>, N extends Number> void main(String[] args) {
020        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> numberTypeSupport = (JavaNumberTypeSupport<N>) JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE;
021        float lambda1 = 0.001f;
022        float lambda2 = 0.000001f;
023
024        VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<N> gd = new VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<>(numberTypeSupport);
025        VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<N> l1 = new VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<>(numberTypeSupport);
026        l1.setInterceptor(new L1Regularization<>(numberTypeSupport.valueOf(lambda1)));
027        VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<N> net = new VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<>(numberTypeSupport);
028        net.setInterceptor(new ElasticNet<>(numberTypeSupport.valueOf(lambda1), numberTypeSupport.valueOf(lambda2)));
029
030        Map<String, O> optimizers = Map.of("L1", (O) l1, "vanilla", (O) gd, "net", (O) net);
031        for (Map.Entry<String, O> optimizerEntry : optimizers.entrySet()) {
032            showForNumberType(numberTypeSupport, optimizerEntry.getKey(), optimizerEntry.getValue(), 10_000_000, 0.1f, 9, 0);
033        }
034    }
035
036    private static <O extends LinearModelOptimizer<N> & IterativeOptimizer<N>, N extends Number> void showForNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, String title, O optimizer, int epochs, float learningRate, int m, long sleep) {
037        LinearRegression<N> regression = createClosedSolutionFitting(typeSupport, optimizer);
038
039        Plot mrePlot = new Plot("RME " + title + "; lr=" + learningRate + " m=" + m);
040        mrePlot.display();
041
042        Plot fitPlot = new Plot("Fit " + title + "; lr=" + learningRate + " m=" + m);
043        fitPlot.setYRange(-2, 2);
044        fitPlot.plotDataSet(regression.getTrainSet(), "Train Set");
045        fitPlot.display();
046
047        Plot weightPlot = new Plot("Absolute sum of weights " + title + "; lr=" + learningRate + " m=" + m);
048        weightPlot.display();
049
050        optimizer.setLearningRate(learningRate);
051        optimizer.setEpochs(epochs);
052        optimizer.setEpochCompletionListener(
053                IterativeOptimizer.sample(250, (epoch, model, trainSet, o) -> {
054                    Pair<Float, Map<String, Float>> currentRmes = regression.calculateRMEs(model);
055                    mrePlot.addToSeries("Train RME", new float[]{epoch}, new float[]{currentRmes.left()});
056                    for (Map.Entry<String, Float> currentRmeEntry : currentRmes.right().entrySet()) {
057                        mrePlot.addToSeries(currentRmeEntry.getKey() + " RME", new float[]{epoch}, new float[]{currentRmeEntry.getValue()});
058                    }
059                    mrePlot.redraw();
060                    weightPlot.addToSeries("Total Weights", new float[]{epoch}, new float[]{(float) (Arrays.stream(model.getParameters()).mapToDouble(p -> model.getCurrentNumberType().absolute(p).doubleValue()).sum())});
061                    weightPlot.redraw();
062                    fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(model, "Fit");
063                    fitPlot.redraw();
064                    if (epoch == epochs || true) {
065                        System.out.println(title + ": " + Arrays.toString(model.getParameters()));
066                    }
067                    Threads.sleepSilently(sleep);
068                }));
069        Threads.runAsynchronously(() -> regression.fitComplexity(m));
070    }
071
072    private static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> createClosedSolutionFitting(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, LinearModelOptimizer<N> optimizer) {
073        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator = SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typeSupport);
074        BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator = new PolynomialFunction.Generator<>(typeSupport);
075        return create(dataSetGenerator, basisFunctionGenerator, optimizer);
076    }
077
078    public static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> create(SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator, LinearModelOptimizer<N> optimizer) {
079        dataSetGenerator.setRandomSeed(165);
080        dataSetGenerator.setNoiseScale(0.5f);
081        DataSet<N> trainSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
082        DataSet<N> testSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
083        Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets = new LinkedHashMap<>();
084        testSets.put("Test Set", testSet);
085        return new LinearRegression<>(basisFunctionGenerator, trainSet, testSets, optimizer);
086    }
087
088}
